Title: FULAFIA, AHI to plant one million trees to check desertification
Summary: Federal University of Lafia (FULAFIA) and Abundance of Hope Initiative (AHI) resolved to plant one million trees nationwide to check deteriorating desertification . The impact of flooding on communities during the rainy season, and to control waste from waste from communities .

Title: Amnesty condemns FG’s failure to address insecurity in Southeast
Summary: Amnesty International condemns Nigerian government’s failure to address rising insecurity in the South-East region . Accuses authorities of allowing widespread human rights abuses and killings to go unchecked for years . In a report titled A Decade of Decades of Human Rights abuses, Amnesty says .

Title: Taraba APC denies setting conditions for Gov Kefas’ defection
Summary: Taraba APC denies setting conditions for Gov Agbu Kefas’ defection from PDP to APC . The leadership of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in Taraba State has dismissed reports suggesting that conditions were set for Governor Agbu Agbu Kefas' defection .

Title: The Design Table: Meet designers pushing fashion beyond the runway
Summary: Lagos Fashion Week 2025 delivered texture, colour, and culture . It showcased not only style but also creativity, innovation, and collaboration . Beyond the runway, one of the most engaging experiences of the week was The Design Table .

Title: ‘Africa can export AI-driven solutions’
Summary: If Africa can deliver on the promise of its youth population, develop the digital skills and innovations needed globally, the next 30 years promise to be a new golden era for the continent .

Title: Pre-election tussles account for 75% of  litigations – INEC
Summary: Pre-election tussles account for 75% of  litigations – INEC . “I was informed that 75 per cent of our litigations are in respect of pre-election matters, mostly dealing with political party tussles and leadership .

Title: Baba-Ahmed urges Tinubu to address Nigerians on Trump’s military threat
Summary: Baba-Ahmed expressed concern that the President had not spoken directly to the nation since Trump accused Nigeria of permitting the alleged killing of Christians .

Title: Hezbollah rejects any negotiations between Lebanon and Israel
Summary: Hezbollah lashed out against the prospect of any political negotiations between Lebanon and Israel . Hezbollah insisted that it has a right to defend itself . Hezbollah insists that it is not interested in any political talks with Israel .

Title: Elon Musk’s $1trn pay package to face Tesla shareholder vote
Summary: Elon Musk's $1trn pay package to face Tesla shareholder vote . Package could lift Musk's holding to more than 25 percent of Tesla shares from its current level of more than 12 percent .

Title: Miss Universe pageant in Thailand marred by drama
Summary: More than 120 women from across the world have gathered in Thailand to compete for Miss Universe . The contest considered one of the "big four" of global beauty pageants .
